Friggin' weird, there is voices in it! I set the box for fast scan, it sou=
nded like a Harley, then did some effects on it, various echos, and reverbs=
, and pitch benders. This goes way beyond anything I can imagine to figure =
out how a voice is made out of this--mind--spining--out of con--trol...(sou=
nds of branin on htting floor..)
 
 Frank-S







________________________=
_________________________________________
You keep typing, we keep giving. =

Friggin' weird, there is voices in it! I set the box for fast s=
can, it sounded like a Harley, then did some effects on it, various ec=
hos, and reverbs, and pitch benders. <BR>This goes way beyond anything I ca=
n imagine to figure out how a voice is made out of this--mind--spining--out=
 of con--trol...(sounds of branin on htting floor..)<BR>
 <BR>
 F=
rank-S<BR><BR><BR>
